briefdescription.para: restart counting the time of the thread.

detaileddescription.para: This should be used only to sigal a start after the playback has been stopped

briefdescription.para: Signals to communicate with the player thread.
Fixed offset for the relative time the file returns.
Save current device settings in a tree storage.

detaileddescription.para: config (tree_storage) storage class, where the data will be saved.

briefdescription.para: Load current device settings from a tree storage.

detaileddescription.para: config (tree_storage) storage class, where the data will be loaded from.

briefdescription.para: Stop playback or recording of the device.
Command the device to play music.

detaileddescription.para: This function starts playing the music of the device at the curren position.

briefdescription.para: Pause playback or recording of the device.
Sets the thread kind for the next thread that is being generated.

detaileddescription.para: If we have already a timer thread then the thread kind will not be changed, but the value is stored for the next generated thread.

parameterdescription.para: if there is a thread that could not be updated.

detaileddescription.para: This function is called from the thread object. It plays the file using sleep operations.
